effect.short: Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by one stage.
effect.full: Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by one stage each.

flavorTexts.text:
The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its
spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.
